|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX4181 |cpu1spd = 390 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;25Q32BVSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9825G6JH-6; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 14:D6:4D,C8:D3:A3 |oui = 14:D6:4D,C8:D3:A3 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = Linux;2.4.18;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, JP2,, unpopulated,, 3.3v TTL,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 12-pin header,, JP1,, unpopulated,, also labled JTAG |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-N40 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/18/2012 |estreldate = 03/02/2012 |estprice = |upc = 790069373596 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B007FECGS8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188RE; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WRGN40..0B2Z" and a checkbox for the below [[Alpha Networks]] :parts is silkscreened on the board. *1WRGN35...A1L *1WRGN40...A1L *1WRGN40...B1L *1DIR600N..B2Z Possible OUI of 14:D6:4D (it's printed on a label in the FCC photos) :Appears to be running Linux 2.4.18 Kernel ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== *PCB Has an unpopulated 12-pin header marked JP2 ::- JTAG, unknown pinout :and a unpopulated 4-pin header marked JP1 ::- UART Serial (3.3v TTL) ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(Square = 1st, Left -> Right)
 ©      ®   ©   ©
 Rx    Vcc GND Tx
Terminal settings: 8N1 @ 38400 / Flow Control: None Serial port can be connect with USB TO COM PL2303HX adapter. :Just connect 3 pin Rx, Tx and GND. Set the baudrate at 38400, and connect Rx pin of adapter to Tx pin of router, :Tx pin of adapter to Rx pin of router, GND of adapter to GND of router. {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==

[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===Hidden WebUI pages=== These do not appear to be listed anywhere on the WebUI. :Run system commands: *IP*/shell.asp :Guest Access / Virtual AP Settings: *IP*/Advanced/Guest_Zone.asp [[Category:English Documentation]]
